mapper.select: select qx.yhid,qx.jsid,js.jsmc,js.fjsid,js.sylx,js.jsdm,js.dwxdbj,jc.csmc sylxmc,jc.cskz2 sylxlj,jc.csdm sylxdm from matridx_yhjs qx left outer join matridx_xtjs js on qx.jsid = js.jsid left join matridx_jcsj jc on jc.csid = js.sylx and jc.scbj ='0' and jc.jclb ='HOME_PAGE_TYPE' where yhid =#{yhid} and js.scbj ='0' order by jsdm,jsid

select yh.yhid,yh.yhm,yh.zsxm from matridx_xtyh yh
yh.scbj='0' and yh.sfsd='0' and not exists (select 1 from matridx_yhjs yhjs where yh.yhid=yhjs.yhid and yhjs.jsid=#{jsid})
and yh.yhid = #{yhid}
and yh.yhm like '%'||#{yhm}||'%'
and yh.zsxm like '%'||#{zsxm}||'%'
